channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-12931] Shuffle tokens stay around forever in LLAP
item.description: Shuffle tokens are never cleaned up, resulting in a slow leak.
item.summary: Shuffle tokens stay around forever in LLAP

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: there's a strange change in verifyRequest with length and substring. Otherwise makes sense.
That was left over from temporary logging. Uploading a patch with the change removed.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12784983/HIVE-12931.02.patch

Hmm, most of these are probably caused by HIVE-12727. Some are whitespace, presumably from bad git apply, and some for some reason didn't fail in HiveQA there even though one query in PerfCliDriver failed with similar error (test issue, CBO flag switched)
